mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(number, status, user_id, address_book_id, order_time, checkout_time, pay_method, pay_status, amount, remark, phone, address, user_name, consignee, cancel_reason, rejection_reason, cancel_time, estimated_delivery_time, delivery_status, delivery_time, pack_amount, tableware_number, tableware_status) VALUES ( #{number}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{addressBookId}, #{orderTime}, #{checkoutTime}, #{payMethod}, #{payStatus}, #{amount}, #{remark}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{userName}, #{consignee},#{cancelReason}, #{rejectionReason}, #{cancelTime}, #{estimatedDeliveryTime}, #{deliveryStatus}, #{deliveryTime}, #{packAmount}, #{tablewareNumber}, #{tablewareStatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN status = 2 THEN 1 END), 0) AS toBeConfirmed, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN status = 3 THEN 1 END), 0) AS confirmed, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN status = 4 THEN 1 END), 0) AS deliveryInProgress FROM orders
